speaker: Jacqueline Maureen
title: Responsible AI Support for Image and Text Models | Part 2
description:
Jacqueline Maureen is here with the latest Responsible AI dashboard for image models, which include image classification, and object detection scenarios. The dashboard provides several mature Responsible AI tools in the areas of model interpretability, unfairness assessment and mitigation, error analysis, and model performance analysis for a holistic assessment and debugging of image models and making informed business decisions. She'll demo how it works!

See Part 1 - RAI Support for Text Models: https://youtu.be/mgVIWloMOQs

00:18 Welcome and Introductions
00:43 What is the RAI dashboard
01:25 Demo - RAI dashboard for Image, object detection scenario
